author: raz
title: Impact Measurements Tool - research
description: A key challenge to track project progress + effectiveness are clear impact measurements, especially for Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
solution: Researching the basis of an Impact Measurements Tool to help define KPIs, measure and report them, with a focus on SDGs impact.
experience: Cardano AIM active Catalyst members, Cardano4Climate, Sustainable ADA, Fund 6 funded SDG proposals
